text: 5.34 Ais 66.1, Mat 23.22, Apo 7.49, Jem 5.12 Yad pen nɨbop agebin, nɨbi ñɨn dad aplanɨl takaw olap agɨnɨg, yad yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨl, takaw anɨgɨl ma agɨnɨmɨb agak. Pen nɨbi ñɨn dad aplanɨl God man ne alaŋ ak yomɨl, yepɨs ma apin, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨl, takaw anɨgɨl ma agɨnɨmɨb agak. Ak God bɨawl besɨgep ne yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak.
